concept_atoms.name: Context
concept_atoms.definition: The structured environment or 'place' where attention lives, providing necessary anchors for thought.

concept_atoms.name: Question
concept_atoms.definition: The fundamental unit of exploration and knowledge gaps; a structured unknown that drives learning.

concept_atoms.name: Flow
concept_atoms.definition: A cognitive state of frictionless movement between ideas, facilitated by external structure and reduced activation energy.

concept_atoms.name: Graph
concept_atoms.definition: A network of relationships between entities (concepts, questions, sources) representing knowledge and gaps.

concept_atoms.name: Atom
concept_atoms.definition: The smallest indivisible unit of meaning or structure in the system (e.g., a single concept node or question node).

concept_atoms.name: Mode
concept_atoms.definition: A distinct operational state of the system or user interaction (Capture, Dialogue, Flow, Reader, Journey).
